attributes.action: Force Jeremy Hunt to remove his NHS pin badge ! To never wear in public again.
attributes.additional_details: He does not support our doctors, nurses, health care workers or the general public. The NHS is our already paid for free at the point of service, that our NI contributions pay for, we and our parents have made the NHS what it is ! We still pay for it, yet it is being sold to the highest bidders, which is now run down because profits is the ultimate reason/gain.I do not believe that Jeremy Hunt should wear the NHS badge ,it implies he is in support of our NHS! I want him forced to remove it.
attributes.background: I want Jeremy Hunt to remove his NHS lapel badge, he does not deserve to wear it,he is not worthy of wearing it,he does not support the NHS in any capacity.tired of his public appearances seeing him with it as if he does represent the NHS. He is responsible for the break up of our public service!

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of Jeremy Hunt as an individual, not the Government or Parliament as a whole.
